How to unlock Find the Mushroom Picker

Derryth Northwest area of Underdark

Find the Mushroom Picker Rewards

Find the Mushroom Picker Notes & Tips

An easy way to reach the backpack is to use the spell Misty Step to teleport to it. After that right click the backpack and throw it to the dwarf, being careful not to damage him. A strong character like Lae'zel can jump from safe spot to safe spot and reach both the b
